value.title: AWS expands Bedrock with new AI models and complex task automation

value.title: Fox Sports' FIFA Women’s World Cup broadcasts to include AI-powered highlights feature
value.excerpt: Fox Sports is implementing Amazon Web Services’ Catch Up With Highlights feature into its FIFA Women’s World Cup broadcasts. The AWS tool uses AI to identify video and audio cues of important moments in the match for real-time generation of a reel that can be viewed by users of the Fox Sports app on mobile devices and connected TVs.
